title: vA kalApa mayil
sahitya:
vA kalApa mayil vaDivEA vanden kalai tarum virundai arundiDavE


anupallavi

  nAvAra unai nAn ArumukhanE nalla tamizh isaiyAl sholli shollik-koNDADa


caraNam    tIyar uravai viTTut-tUya toNDarai naTTu tAyinum anbAm un shEi pOl irundu
manap-pEiyai aDakki shiva nEyam tanil eppOdum tOyum pErinbam tarat-tuLLi vaLLiyuDanE
